LEAD AND MENTOR YOUNG PEOPLE
FIND OUT MORE
NCS with The Challenge is an exciting youth and community programme which combines outdoor activities, skill development and community volunteering. This is a fantastic opportunity for talented, enthusiastic and experienced people wishing to work with young people and make a difference within their communities.
We have paid positions available for all entry levels, from those wishing to gain further experience in a youth work setting, to experienced Project Managers, Teachers and Youth Workers.
Please feel free to forward this email to anyone who might be interested!
PRACTITIONER ROLES
Practitioner Roles: This role requries an individual with expereince and training in a particular skill, and the ability to engage a group and share their knowledge and passion for their skill.
Teach your chosen skill to a group of twelve young people over three mornings, and accompany your teams on community visits in the afternoons. Then work with the teams to create a showcase of the skills they have developed.
We have practitioner roles available in drama, media, enterprise, photography, music and sport.
OTHER PAID OPPORTUNITIES
Leader Roles Lead between 60 and 84 young people and up to 15 staff members through a complex and demanding programme, and be responsible for challenging behaviour during residential stays.
Mentor Roles Facilitate, lead and pastorally care for your team, ensuring the personal development of each young person while undertaking various exciting activities.
Logistics Officer Roles Assist with the logistical management of different weeks of the programme, managing relationships with key partners and young people.
Support Worker Roles Focus on ensuring a young person with additional requirements can participate to their full potential on the programme through one-to-one support.
Many of our roles have a residential element to them. Please check individual role descriptions on www.ncsthechallenge.org/seasonal-roles for more details.
OUR SEASONAL PROGRAMMES
When can you work on NCS with The Challenge?
We run our seasonal youth programmes throughout the year. Find the best programme for you at www.ncsthechallenge.org/about-the-programme
Spring: February to March
Summer: Late June to Early October
Autumn:Late October to Early December
